text: this dessert is like a blank canvas I
mean a delicious blank canvas but this
is the dessert that everybody should
have up their sleeve because it's simple
and you can tailor it to the seasons
flour ground almonds confectioner sugar
for the crust and then there's also some
lemon zest which just gives us great
perfume and then the poppy seeds add a
lovely crunch it actually tastes kind of
like a shortbread cookie which is really
good when you eat it with the ricotta so
I'm just gonna put this in the fridge
and let it rest for an hour
it's kind of fun to just press it right
into the tart town and then I like to
take my tart pan and put it on a little
cookie sheet and bake it like this it
just makes it easier to get in and out
of the oven when I was developing the
recipe for this chart I first tried it
using all ricotta and the filling and it
was great but it's a little bit heavy so
then I added just a little bit of
mascarpone and that lightened it up and
it made it a little silkier a little
smooth then a little bit of sugar
cinnamon and a little bit of honey
buckwheat honey is great and then that
is it that is all you need to do for the
filling
and back into the oven it's done when
it's slightly jiggly mostly solid crazy
Joseph mister is so adaptable you could
put any seasonal fruit so if you've got

summer in winter you could use poached
